channel.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Info on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Billing_Info on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Info
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Info Service Datatype Description Every SoftLayer customer account has billing specific information which is kept in the SoftLayer_Billing_Info data type. This information is used by the SoftLayer accounting group when sending invoices and making billing inquiries. Local accountId A SoftLayer account's identifier. Type: integer anniversaryDayOfMonth The day of the month that a SoftLayer customer is billed. Type: integer cardAccountNumber This value doesn't persist to this object.
